title: Welcome To My Blog
text:
This blog provides news on conservation, covering forest management, ecotourism, and antiquities. These roles are mandated to the Tanzania Forest Services Agency.This blog, informed by my work at Tanzania Forest Service, will be a key resource for sharing crucial updates.



Mlele forest reserve walk way


Since this post doesn’t specify an explicit image, the first image in the post will be used in the listing page of posts.

title: My New post
text: Stephano Semba is integrating data science with his conservation background to solve emerging environmental challenges. This skillset is an asset for both his career growth and his institute’s impact.

title: About
text: Stephano Semba is leveraging his background in conservation by integrating it with data science to solve emerging environmental issues and advance his career. Stephano’s conservation career began at the Forest Training Institute, Olmotonyi, and he was inspired by his family to integrate data science into this field.

title: New Feeds
text:
The Miombo woodlands are vital ecosystems for both communities and wildlife. The Mlele Forest Reserve, located in Mlele District, is a prime example, providing essential resources and serving as a crucial year-round water catchment via the Kapapa River.



The kapapa river at Mlele Forest
